short_description: lamcom guangzhou ltd. is a clothing store based in kowloon, hong kong.
long_description: in our homepage you will see typical products we have made for some market leaders of apparel industry. lamcom is a complete vertical manufacturer of button, zipper and hardware for clothing related industries. lamcom has been one of the nominated button and zipper suppliers to leading companies such as kmart, wal-mart, sears, bonton, vfc, gv and famous brands such as faded glory, no boundaries, ruff hewn, lee, route66 etc for over 2 decades. lamcom, a truly vertical operation started 25 years ago, updated with most advanced technology and machinery, manufactures all types of buttons (jean's button and fastners, alloy die cast, plastic buttons etc), all types of zippers(nylon, metal, plastic, invisible) at most competitive prices with highest level of customer service.
business_tags: machinery manufacturing | die casting | tracks & recordings
generated_description: lamcom, legally known as lamcom inc., is a vertically integrated manufacturer of buttons, zippers, and hardware for the clothing industry. based in kowloon, hong kong, the company has been a supplier to leading apparel industry leaders such as kmart, walmart, sears, bonton, vfc, gv, and well-known brands like faded glory, no boundaries, ruff hewn, lee, and route66 for over 25 years. lamcom is recognized for its advanced technology and machinery, producing a wide range of buttons and zippers, including jean buttons, alloy die-cast, plastic buttons, nylon, metal, and plastic zippers. the company is known for its reliability and high level of customer service.
